data.title: St Peters Episcopal Church (973) 334
data.meta_description: St Peters Episcopal Church Mountain Lakes New Jersey (973) 334-4429
data.text:
WELCOME to St. Peter's

St. Peter’s welcomes visitors, inquirers and newcomers to our parish community. St. Peter's is committed to celebrating and growing our Christian faith through the Word of God, worship, community and the demonstration of Christian love through service to our neighbors and those in need. St. Peter's Mission Statement is available here.

Key news

To find out what's happening at St. Peter's and see opportunities for fellowship, formation and outreach, click here.​​

SUMMER Sunday worship

Our services are held in church and are live streamed.

8:00 AM: Rite I Holy Eucharist (Brief, spoken Mass)

9:30 AM: Rite II Holy Eucharist with Music (After Labor Day, our 2nd service and Sunday School are held at 10:15 am)

St. peter's Annual auction

Join us on Saturday, October 5 from 5-10pm for St. Peter's annual auction, this year, themed Once Upon a Time. This is a family friendly event so bring everyone dressed as your favorite fable or nursery rhyme character. Click here to purchase tickets now through Vanco. Costs are $65 per adult, $55 for seniors, and $25 for youths. Kids 10 and under are free! We'll also have on-site child daycare down in the Undercroft and plenty of fun times and merriment for everyone.

St. peter's Centennial ​renewal

Entering our 2nd century of ministry, this generation of St. Peter's parishioners want to Extend God's Embrace beyond our walls. We do this, everyday through our warm welcoming and outreach to our neighbors. We hope now to do this physically through structural improvements to our property so that is apparent that all are welcome to enter and enjoy our space and the renewal that God wills for all. ​

Click here to find out what you will see.

To make a financial pledge to St. Peter's Centennial Renewal click here.

To make a donation to St. Peter's Centennial Renewal click here.
